definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: In autumn, Wusuli River is like an azure sea, lucid and transparent.
sentences.chinese: 秋天，烏蘇里江像蔚藍色的海，清澈透明。

sentences.english: Wusuli Jiang basin, while Russia had sovereignty over Siberia.
sentences.chinese: 烏蘇里江流域，而俄羅斯有超過西伯利亞的主權。

sentences.english: Himalayan Southwest Chu, Ussuri River north-east side.
sentences.chinese: 喜瑪拉雅西南矗，烏蘇里江東北邊。

sentences.english: Skirmishes were already underway between Soviet and Chinese forces on the Ussuri River.
sentences.chinese: 中蘇衝突當時已經在烏蘇里江暴發。
